document.masterDocTitle: The bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the European part of Russia, with keys to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the European part of Russia, with keys to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Apis cunicularia Linnaeus 1760 : 422
( type locality: Sweden ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

in
Fourcroy 1785
: 444
, ♂ ( type locality: N France ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes hirta Lepeletier
de Saint-Fargeau & Audinet-Serville 1828 : 406 ( type locality: "aux environs de Paris").

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Colletes pilosus
Spinola 1838
: 507
, ♂ ( type locality: Egypt ).

Colletes cunicularius infuscatus
Noskiewicz 1936
: 396
–398, ♀, ♂ ( type locality: Spain , Italy , North Africa).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes cunicularius celticus O’Tolle 1974 : 163
–167 ( type locality: England ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Colletes cunicularius tauricus
Warncke 1978
: 365
–366, ♂ ( type locality: Akseki, Taurus, Turkey ).

Distribution in Russia
(
Fig. 2
h). Lenigradskaya Prov., Moscow Prov., Udmurtia Republic, Rostov Prov., Volgograd Prov., Bashkortostan Republic, Kirov Prov., Siberia, Far East.

General distribution. Ireland , Great Britain , Spain , Norway , Sweden , Netherlands , Belgium , France , Denmark , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Finland , Poland , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Italy , Slovenia , Serbia , Romania , Greece , Ukraine , Russia , Turkey , Kazakhstan , Mongolia , China [Beijing, Hebei, Heilongjiang].
